title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: white, red, green and yellow; plain weave with discontinued weave weft designs: diamonds, chevron; narrow pieces laced together with red button hole stitch; square neck hole with out-facing pink and purple petals outlined in featherstitch; silk tassel designs in satin stitch, front and back
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
